entry.title: PredicateJudge -- analyze the design based on SPI
entry.summary: Apache Shenyu has been identified as a gateway application which supports a variety of protocols and microservice frameworks such as Dubbo, gRPC, Spring-Cloud, etc. To do this, the product has accomplished an elegant SPI (Service Provider Interface) as its foundation, and make the Rule data parsing and predicting program very simple , resiliency and security. As to rule data parsing processing, the SPI design increases the product's scalability. When appending new plugin, in most cases, the existing module is enough for rule data parsing , otherwise it can be rapidly carry out with tiny effort.
